attributes.action: Financially support cinemas during this difficult time!
attributes.additional_details:
This is due to the postponement of major movie titles. Because of this cinemas across the nation are struggling to attract an audience. With the closure of this chain of cinemas over 5,500 employees face being made jobless.

Cinemas in total across the UK contributes over 1.2 billion pounds in taxes, and supports 100,000 jobs. Please support these jobs and the cinema industry as a whole.
attributes.background:
Financially help the UK cinema industry by giving these businesses a life line. Ensure that cinemas chains do not have to close their doors and face making up to 100,000 people jobless.

The cinema chain Cineworld has announced today (4th of October) that it may have to shut all of the branches.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Provide increased support to the cinema industry to protect it and employees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553300

Extend furlough scheme for the Cinema industry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553253
